item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs, SBF’s Former Jailmate, Acquitted On Most Serious Charges
item.description:
Sean "Diddy" Combs has been acquitted of racketeering and sex-trafficking in Manhattan court while convicted on prostitution charges connected to Cassie Ventura. The rapper, once housed alongside Sam Bankman-Fried at MDC, now faces sentencing guidelines that could keep additional prison time to a minimum.

item.title: Critical Cisco Vulnerability in Unified CM Grants Root Access via Static Credentials
item.description:
Cisco has released security updates to address a maximum-severity security flaw in Unified Communications Manager (Unified CM) and Unified Communications Manager Session Management Edition (Unified CM SME) that could permit an attacker to login to a susceptible device as the root user, allowing them to gain elevated privileges.
